attributes.action: February 29th should a national bank holiday!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
February 29th should a national bank holiday, workers all over the UK works an additional day each leap year, give this day back to the workers?

Annual salary is worked out on 365 days in the year, give this 1-day back.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
